authors: Jan-Henk Edens, Bennie Schutten, Raymon Boer

deprecation.message: Please make sure you are running Clickker V2 before migrating!

description:
Een client voor het uitvragen en afhandelen van anvragen richting Polybius. 
Polybius is de API voor connectivity met Exact Globe.
releaseNotes:
v1.0.18.0
- Added Custom Query Support
v1.0.17.1
- Added Extended version of Company
v1.0.17.0
- Added more reporting functionality.
v1.0.16.7
- Added retreival of ProductionOrders
v1.0.16.6
      - Added alternative ability to receive debtors.
      v1.0.16.5
      - Added start and limit to project api
      v1.0.16.4
      - Added Gbk Mutations
      v1.0.16.3
      - Added UpdateSalesOrder
      v1.0.16.2
      - Added Invoice Status list with the last changedate for a invoicenumber
      v1.0.16.0
      - Added Invoice lines for the invoice statuscall
      v1.0.15.2
      - Added Human Resources Actions
      v1.0.14.2
      - Changed DateFormat in GET Stock.
      v1.0.14.1
      - Added Get Project functionality
      - Added Validation Checks for Creating HourEntryLines
      v1.0.13
      - Minor bugfixes
      - Added CreditLine to Debtor Update Model
      - Return Model for reating a Debtor had the wrong ReturnType

      v1.0.12
      - Minor bugfixes
      - Model Definitions for Financial Entry updated
      - Bug Fixed in model Definition Company
      - Model Definitions for Items/Articles updated
      - GetPriceList returned unexpected response
      v1.0.11
      - Added Ledger Balance Field
      - Fixed: Invalid Endpoint url for FindByFreeField
      - Added Proper Model voor Creating a salesorder
      - Fixed: returnType for creating salesorder
      - Changed model for Stock to match api
      - Fixed: return types for getting Array of (contact,invoicestatus,pricelist,quotation)
      v1.0.10
      - Added Ledger Signular call
      v1.0.9
      - Added Ledger Calls
      v1.0.8
      - Fixes for creating Financial Entries
      v1.0.7
      - Upgraded to Full JSON mode.
